title: Ghost ide
massges:
Ghost Idea Version 2.0.7
What's new?
- Added image viewer in the form of a slider
- Improved graphics
- Improved program speed
- Added list filter and global search with the ability to click on the file and open the file
- Fixed an error entering the program
- Added new APIs for developers 
editor.addDiagnostic(Diagnostic.class);
editor.removeDiagnostic(Diagnostic.class);
editor.clearDiagnostics();
editor.setDiagnostic(List<Diagnostic>);

- Added github feed
- Added github stared
- Added Empty state
- Added Link Preview
- Added Ghost text(beta)
